recipe.title: Spring Greens with Sherry Vinaigrette
ingredients: 2 tablespoons bacon drippings reserved from Bacon-Wrapped Baked Eggs with Polenta
instructions: Whisk vinegar, mustard, and brown sugar in small bowl. Whisk in olive oil and bacon drippings. Season dressing to taste with salt and pepper.
Mix mâche, arugula, and green onions in large bowl; toss with dressing.
